Page bundles let you keep images and other assets alongside your Markdown content, making it easy to organize related files.

## Adding Images

Here's an example of an image stored in the same directory as this post:

![Example diagram](diagram.png)

This approach keeps your content self-contained â€” no need to manage a separate `static/images` directory for post-specific assets.
